pages.text: $(bgreen)Plants$() are creatures that $(l)are hostile to zombies and $(bred)all kinds of monsters$(). Different plants have different usages. Some can produce sun, such as SunFlowers. Some can attack enemies, such as PeaShooters. Some can defend, such as NutWalls.

$(bgreen)Plants$() are relatively fragile. Terrestrial plants can only survive on $(l)grass blocks and Water lilies and golden tiles and flower pots$(), while aquatic plants can only survive $(l)in water$().

Both $(l)plants and zombies$() have $(bred)qualities$(). The qualities are $(bred)gray, white, green, blue, purple, gold$(), which become higher from left to right. The higher the quality, the stronger the corresponding plants or zombies. $(l)More experience gained from killing high-quality zombies$(). For plants, $(l)the higher the quality, the more difficult it is to get$().
